name: 0xConnect
description: 0xConnect is an AI-powered decentralized protocol for private and secure transactions on the Ethereum network. The purpose is to enable secure and private transactions while providing users with confidence and trust when engaging in transactions within the platform. The feature includes a Telegram mixer bot (https://t.me/Connect0xMixAI_bot), revenue share dApps (https://revenue.0xconnecthq.io/#/) to share rewards for holders who hold the $0xCon token, and 0xConnect Auditor dApps.
